Posts.Content: I don't know what you are looking for, but my mom has a never before worn short, golden brown wig, I am sure she would just give it to your mom, Its cute. My father was recently diagnosed with stage four gastric cancer, and my whole family is a mess. We would love to do anything to help someone. my e-mail is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed.  Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---- Sincerely,Carlee
